role.argrole: thing being expressed, manifested, or indicated

example.parse: VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS اعرب) (NP-SBJ-1 (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP عن) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN سعادت) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه))) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (NP (NOUN تولي) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المهمة))) (NP-TMP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_DU_ACC سنتين))))))

arg.g: his happiness about taking on this mission for two years
